https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/C6D8RHgGtGsGnpMTpRIiVwhFAu.jpg Fleeing 1930s New York and leaving behind a chequered past, the giltzy divorcee Mrs Stella Erlynne travels to Italy's sun-dappled Amalfi coast. Mrs Erlynne's appearance causes a stir amongst the visiting aristocracy. Based on the Oscar Wilde play "Lady Windemere's Fan." A Good Woman
